entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is screaming in excitement as she sees something.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks lands on the ground and stumbles towards Lupin.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is unable to speak and has a set and white face.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is dazed but okay after the incident.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being with Hermione and Ron.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is waiting for some people to return and tells her parents that Ron is okay.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is one of the people who has not returned yet.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is another person who has not returned yet.

entities.name: mad-eye
entities.description: Mad-Eye is also waiting to return.

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: Mundungus is the last person who has not returned yet.

relationships.description: Ron and Harry are together after the incident.
Hermione is concerned about Ron's safety.
Tonks and Lupin are together after Tonks lands on the ground.
Ginny is informing her parents that Ron is okay.
